name: OutLawd
description:
Survive in this harsh desert enviroment!

Hunt on a vast range of wild animals for dinner or skin!
Rob a bank, general store or many more buildings in random generated towns to earn cash and/or loot!
Build yourself a fortress to protect yourself from threats!
Fight off bounty hunters who want you dead or alive!
Fight native americans who stand in your way!
Upgrade to a large range of weapons and explosives, inc. the portable gatling gun!
Get the highest bounty in the country!
Fight the law!
